item.title: Trump says Musk saved hurricane victims by providing Starlink
item.description: President Trump said Elon Musk saved many lives in North Carolina after the state was ravaged by Hurricane Helene.

item.title: Trump says DOGE cost-cutting measures won't affect Social Security, Medicare
item.description: President Trump said Tuesday that his administration's cost-cutting measures won't affect entitlements such as Social Security and Medicare.

item.title: Catholic bishops sue Trump administration to demand restart of refugee money
item.description: The U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops sued the Trump administration on Tuesday, asking a federal judge to order the State Department to restart the ...

item.title: Trump says Musk implementing his executive orders
item.description: President Trump said that "a lot" of his executive orders will be codified into law, after he credited Elon Musk with helping get his orders carried o...

item.title: Trump instructs Justice Department to fire Biden-era U.S. attorneys
item.description: President Trump called on the Justice Department to fire all U.S. attorneys left over from the Biden administration.
